summary: Patches the Historical Roman cloaks to use the correct biped slots.
descriptionHtml:
[b]- Description -[/b]

Makes the necessary changes to the Roman cloak meshes and the "Roman armor and weapons replacer.esp" file to use the correct biped slots.
[b]
[/b]This is for the weapon and armour replacer version [u]only[/u].
[b]
- Requirements -[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32988/?]Historical Revival - The Roman Era
[/url]
[b]- Installation -[/b]

Unpack the contents of the .zip file to your Skyrim\Data directory. Overwrite if prompted.

[b]- Uninstallation -[/b]

Delete the following files from your Skyrim\Data directory.
1) meshes\armor\imperial\f\jSagumArcaniF_0.nif
2) meshes\armor\imperial\f\jSagumArcaniF_1.nif
3) meshes\armor\imperial\m\jsagum_0.nif
4) meshes\armor\imperial\m\jsagum_1.nif
5) meshes\armor\imperial\m\jSagumArcani_0.nif
6) meshes\armor\imperial\m\jSagumArcani_1.nif
7) meshes\armor\imperial\m\jsagumheavy.nif
8) Roman armor and weapons replacer.esp

If you are not removing [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32988/?]Historical Revival - The Roman Era[/url] you will need to replace the removed files with the originals.

[b]- Changelog -[/b]

1.0 - Initial release.

[b]- Credits -[/b]

Thanks toÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/714867]Jedo_Dre[/url] for his great mod!

[b]- Permissions -
[/b]
Any changes done to this file requires permission from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/714867]Jedo_Dre[/url] in accordance to permissions listed under [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32988/?]Historical Revival - The Roman Era[/url].
author: DigitalVixen
